# Kevin Gilds

### Hi there {{< fa handshake >}} my name is Kevin

I am an R/Shiny Developer with expertise in helping nonprofits collect, manage and analyze their program data. I learned data science techniques to make these jobs better.

{{< fa face-smile >}} Pronouns: he/him

{{< fa binoculars >}} I'm currently working on improving my data pipelines, and communicating data with Shiny Applications.

{{< fa seedling >}} I'm currently learning Bash and SQL

{{< fa people-group >}} I'm looking to collaborate on Shiny Applications.

{{< fa comment-dots >}} Ask me about data in the nonprofit sector.

{{< fa inbox >}} How to reach me: kevin.gilds\@hey.com
